official_title: To prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from making airport development grants to the Port of Oakland until the Port of Oakland enters into an agreement with the Secretary relating to air traffic at Oakland International Airport.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from making any airport development project grant involving the Oakland International Airport, California, until the Port of Oakland enters into an agreement satisfactory to the Secretary regarding the use of specified runways for take-offs and landings between 10 p.m. and 7 a.m.

titles.title: To prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from making airport development grants to the Port of Oakland until the Port of Oakland enters into an agreement with the Secretary relating to air traffic at Oakland International Airport.
